title: How to Wrap a Gift in a Bag

steps.title: Open the gift bag and lay it on its side on a table or surface.
steps.content: Open the gift bag and lay it on its side on a table or surface. Make sure it is the correct size for the gift. Wrap the gift in colored tissue paper.

steps.title: Scrunch tissue paper and place at the bottom of the bag.
steps.content: Scrunch tissue paper and place at the bottom of the bag.

steps.title: Slide gift into bag and turn bag upright.
steps.content: Slide gift into bag and turn bag upright. Place two small sheets of paper inside the bag between bag opening and gift on each side.

steps.title: Make sure the tissue paper covers the gift.
steps.content: Make sure the tissue paper covers the gift. Allow the tissue paper to extend above the sides of the bag itself, arranging it neatly and attractively.

steps.title: Tie the handles together with a small piece of scissor curled ribbon if the gift is small enough to accept this.
steps.content: Tie the handles together with a small piece of scissor curled ribbon if the gift is small enough to accept this. Otherwise, just allow the handles to be separate. Its easier to carry it this way.
